Title: Causes the closed-circuit television system of cameras to record certain images in a certain manner
Summary: Causes the closed-circuit television system of cameras to record certain images in a manner that allows the identification of the license plate as well as the make and model of the motor vehicle.
LawCode: Amd ยง10, Hway L; amd ยง361, Pub Auth L; amd ยง2903, NYC Chart
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, the public authorities law and the New York city charter, in relation to causing the closed circuit television system of cameras to record certain images in a certain manner
